about_the_game:
Enable an in-game guide that covers the entire first season of Being a DIK.
Press the 'g' key at any time to show the guide while playing.
The interface includes a quick navigation system that lets you jump to sections of the guide and jump to the page that's most relevant to the current choice in your ongoing game.

With this guide, you can get help with:
  • Finding every collectible
  • Unlocking every lewd scene
  • Unlocking every achievement
  • Finding out what the characters think about your choices
  • Finding out how your choices will affect different scenes in the game
  • Mastering every mini-game

The guide is packed with 171 pages with images and to-the-point text.

content_descriptors.notes: The guide graphically depicts sex, usage of drugs and violence.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

short_description: An in-game guide for Season 1 of Being a DIK, including a walkthrough, how to unlock everything, and more. The guide is integrated with the base game, and you can bring it up while playing with the press of a single button.
